org.keycloak.adapters.springsecurity.management

Class HttpSessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keycloak.adapters.springsecurity.management.HttpSessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, UserSessionManagement

    @Component
public class HttpSessionManager
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, UserSessionManagement
    User session manager for handling logout of Spring Secured sessions.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Scott Rossillo
